definition.text: Mentorship Power is the Token Power that goes into the Mentorship Program, and determines how strong your participation is in the program.

translations.text: Сила наставничества (Mentorship Power) - это сила токена (Token Power), которая используется в программе наставничества и определяет, насколько сильным будет ваше участие в программе.

paragraphs.text: Right click and Edit to enter edit mode and change this text. ENTER to write new paragraphs. ESC to exit edit mode. Then you can use docs.save to save your changes and app.contribute to send it to the main repository.
